reviewText: we absolutely love this program/DVD and my daughter has learned so much.  In fact, she has a speech/language delay but thanks to this video she speaks up a storm. She cannot stop talking about all the different animals and all the silly things that the wild kratts do.  Thanks wild Kratts for educating and entertaining my daughter!!blessings to all
summary: EDUCATIONAL AND FUN, both my daughter and I have loved watching this program!! it is AMAZING!!!
Title: Wild Kratts: Wildest Animal Adventures

reviewText: Our kids like these even though they're only around 3.  I think they'll be even more interested in a year or two.  These shows have both live and animation.  Very educational.
summary: Our kids like these even though they're only around 3
Title: Wild Kratts: Wildest Animal Adventures

reviewText: My kids absolutely love Wild Kratts but we seem to always miss it on the PBS channel.  If you have never seen it before, Wild Kratts is a show about animals that features both animation and actual people.  The show is mostly animated adventures the Wild Kratt brothers go on to find out how animals do different things.  Luckily though their new DVD has us set for awhile with 20 whole episodes on it!  Yes 20 episodes!  After watching all 20 we could probably even go back and start watching them again as the episodes never get old for my kids and after 20 they will seem somewhat fresh again going back to the beginning of the DVD.  Now these are all episodes from television but its nice to have them all together and even categorized by theme of the episode.Creature Adventures:Mom of a CrocWhale of a SquidAardvark TownFlight of the DracoMystery of Squirmy WormyPlatypus CafeBuild it BeaverVoyage of the Butterflier XTHoney SeekersBass ClassLost at Sea:Speaking DolphineseBlowfish BlowoutJungle Animals:Walk on the WetsideA Huge Orange ProblemBirds of a FeatherGoogly-Eye:  The NIght GuruPredator Power:Stuck on SharksMimicLittle HowlerRaptor RoundupI received this DVD to review in exchange for sharing my honest opinion.
Title: Wild Kratts: Wildest Animal Adventures

reviewText: My daughter loves the PBS kids programs, but I don't love all of them as much as she does. I was so happy to find the really educational ones (like Wild Kratts and Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood) on Amazon so that I could have a better idea of what she's watching and make sure that she's getting good lessons and learning fun facts in a "different" way.
Title: Wild Kratts: Wildest Animal Adventures

reviewText: Grandkids are absolutely delighted with this set.  Everything I could have hoped for.  Plenty shows to watch.  Wild Kratts are absolutely a fantastic show for kids and even adults.  I love to watch it with the kids.  I learn so much from it.  Cool how they show the real animals and then go to an animated show to make it easier for the kids to understand.
Title: Wild Kratts: Wildest Animal Adventures
